mapper.select: SELECT CC.* FROM CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER_REGULAR CC WHERE GUID = #GUID#
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER_REGULAR (GUID, CLASSCLASSIFICATIONGUID, CLASSIFICATIONITEMGUID, FIELDNAME, ISNUMBERING, FORMAT, STYLE,
CREATEUSERGUID, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME) VALUES (#GUID#, #CLASSCLASSIFICATIONGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CLASSIFICATIONITEMGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FIELDNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ISNUMBERING:VARCHAR:NULL#, #FORMAT:VARCHAR:NULL#, #STYLE:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
mapper.update:
UPDATE CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER_REGULAR
UPDATETIME=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATEUSERGUID=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, GUID=#GUID#, CLASSCLASSIFICATIONGUID=#CLASSCLASSIFICATIONGUID#, CLASSIFICATIONITEMGUID=#CLASSIFICATIONITEMGUID#, FIELDNAME=#FIELDNAME#, ISNUMBERING=#ISNUMBERING#, FORMAT=#FORMAT#, STYLE=#STYLE#,
WHERE GUID = #GUID#
